description: The Big Scene - A smoldering pairing that pits newcomerTony Scalia opposite the ever-popular Bret Wolfe. With directorMichael Soldier up close and personal, camera in hand, the sceneunfolds as Tony Scalia throws a trademark fuck that sends Bret Wolfeinto the stratosphere of delight. Again, a top notch performance fromtwo gay guys who love having sex!
title: The Dirty Director, Scene #05
